content: {"name": "Farwell Recreation Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://detroitmi.gov/departments/detroit-parks-recreation/recreation-centers/food-resources", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2711 Outer Drive East", "address_2": null, "city": "Farwell", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48234", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4415544, "longitude": -83.05847949999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 224-1100", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
